cells.text: Income Taxes
cells.text_vi: Thuế thu nhập

cells.text: Our income tax expense is based on our income, statutory tax rates,

cells.text: in which we operate. Tax laws are complex and subject to different

cells.text: income tax expense and in evaluating our tax positions, including

cells.text: DISCLOSURES ABOUT MARKET RISK
cells.text_vi: Mục 7a. Định lượng và định tính

cells.text: Our market risks relate primarily to changes in interest rates, and
cells.text_vi: Tiết lộ về rủi ro thị trường
